lead_paragraph: Lawrence Phillips, the former N.F.L. and Nebraska running back, was convicted yesterday in Los Angeles of seven counts of assault with a deadly weapon for driving a car at a group of young men, injuring three.
snippet: Lawrence Phillips, the former N.F.L. and Nebraska running back, was convicted yesterday in Los Angeles of seven counts of assault with a deadly weapon for driving a car at a group of young men, injuring three.
